mapper.select: SELECT comment_no as commentNo, board_no as boardNo, b_Comment as bComment, regdate as regDate, del_yn as delYN, member_id as memberId FROM BOARDCOMMENT LEFT JOIN MEMBER USING (member_no) WHERE board_no = #{_parameter}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARDCOMMENT VALUES( COMMENT_SQ.nextval, #{boardNo}, #{memberNo}, #{bComment}, SYSDATE, 'N' )
mapper.delete: delete from BOARDCOMMENT DEL_YN = 'Y' where comment_No=#{commentNo} and DEL_YN='N'
